cast.overview: A story centered around an Indian family who moves to France and opens a restaurant across the street from a Michelin-starred French restaurant.
cast.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey

details.biography:
Dillon Mitra is a British actor from Muswell Hill in North London. He began his career in front of the camera at just four months old in a promo for the Discovery Channel. He was quickly signed by an agent for modeling and commercial work and has appeared in a multitude of print and broadcast campaigns.

Mitra has always wanted to be an actor, and he is passionate about film. Having worked since such an early age, he has built up a solid body of experience that allows him to take direction with ease and lends him confidence in front of the camera. He currently attends the Saturday Youth Theatre at the Central School Of Speech & Drama. "The Hundred-Foot Journey" is his feature film debut.  - IMDb Mini Biography
details.name: Dillon Mitra
